Consumable.Name: Hyper-stim Med Pack
Consumable.Description: A medical pack containing fast-acting stimulants that can heal wounds and rejuvenate the user's body.
Consumable.Effects: Heals 50 HP; Increases Dexterity by 2 for 5 turns
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: Found in the infirmary of the spacecraft, crucial for surviving tough battles.

Consumable.Name: Energy Cell
Consumable.Description: An advanced power cell that can be used to recharge energy-based weapons or shields.
Consumable.Effects: Restores 100% of weapon energy; grants a temporary shield absorbing 30 damage
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: Essential for keeping energy weapons operational and providing a defensive boost.

Consumable.Name: Gravity Grenade
Consumable.Description: A grenade that temporarily alters the gravity in a small area, floating enemies helplessly.
Consumable.Effects: Stuns enemies for 2 turns; deals 15 damage
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: Can turn the tide of battle by disabling groups of enemies.
